venue.address_1: See directions in the body of the announcement.
venue.name: Farmington Avenue MDC Reservoir

item.description:
Looks like this coming Sunday will be the nicest day of the week.  As far as brunch we could either bring our own picnic brunch (there are tables) and/or go to a restaurant with outdoor tables like Naples Pizza on Rte. 4.  Suggestions are welcome.  We'll keep people posted as to weather, etc.

 

Directions to
West Hartford Water Treatment Facility
1420 Farmington Avenue, Route 4, West Hartford, CT 06107

 

From the North and South: Take I-91 South or North to I-84 West and follow the directions below.

From the East and West: Take I-84 to Exit 39 (Route 4). At the end of the ramp take a right at the light onto Route 4 East. At the sixth light (a distance of 2 ½ miles) take a left into the Facility.
item.name: Let's try the walk at the Farmington Avenue Reservoir
